name: Second World: Air War
description:
2080 AD, humans begin traveling farther into space than ever before, discovering numerous races of extra terrestrial beings.

Unavoidable contact with these hostile aliens leads to an interstellar sky war the world has never seen.

Take to the skies in massive airships created using an arsenal of state of the art technology.

Prepare for a war that's out of this world...


Features:
1. High-quality 3D air combat game
   2. Super giant warships & carrier
   3. Infinite bullets
   4. 360 degrees free flight
   5. Infinite broad sky
   6. 3D stereo clouds
   7. Super high-speed sprint flight
   8. Different world battles
9. Support Twitter sharing game photo

Operation:
   Virtual GamePad (joystick)

Weapons & Functions:
   1. Bullet - close range attack
   2. Missile - long range attack a single enemy
   3. Beam gun - long-range wide-range attack enemy
   4. Speed up flight - close range wide-range lightning attack enemy


https://www.facebook.com/SW.AirWar/

(IPhone 6 or above is recommended)
